summary: This adds a potion that will transform you instantly into a vampire , vampire lord or Werewolf.
descriptionHtml:
[Size=4][FONT=Segoe UI]Vampire and Werewolf Potion [/FONT][/size]

[line]

[FONT=Segoe UI]
= Description =

* This adds a potion that will transform you into a vampire or werewolf without worrying anything.
* This also adds a potion that cures you from vampirism and lycanthropy :
 (Vampire - Blessed Water)
 (Werewolf - Enchanted Elixir)

* You can't drink those 2 potion at the same time.

* You can buy the following from :

-------Lucan in Riverwood(Riverwood Trader) -------

   Extracted Vampire Blood = 1000g + 
   Extracted Lord Vampire Blood = 1500g +
   Extracted Werewolf Blood = 1500g +

-------Falion in morthal (Falion's house or just near him)-------

   Blessed water = 1300g +

-------Elrindir in Whiterun (Drunken Huntsman)-------

   Enchanted Elixir = 1300g +

~~~

* Just Drink the cure potion when you're standing and not in combat
(cause it i will mess up mah animation)

* If you want a non dawnguard and for lower version,
Download Zim8662 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8918//?]Master's Vampires Blood[/url]

[line]

= Installation =

* Just Activate my mod with the NMM
* For manual installation just drag and drop it to your skyrim location, Merge it

~Upgrading~

~ Upgrading 1 to 1.2 ~

* Install it normally then go in game then :
Drink a cure a potion so that my scripts will restart and function normally.

[line]

= Change log  =

~v1.2
* Added A cure potion for werewolf called "Enchanted Elixir"
* Fix some bugs from the werewolf potion
* Fix the bug that you can drink Werewolf potion even if you're a Vampire etc.

~ v1 ~
* Initial Release

[line]

= Requirements =

* Skyrim v 1.9
* Dawnguard

[line]
= Bugs =

* Well none so far,

[line]

= Compatibility =

* not compatible on mods that change the default Vampire and werewolf quests
 (Edited scripts is okay)


[line]

= Recommended Mods =

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9717//?]Better Vampires[/url] by Brehanin
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38829//?]BVFE - Better Vampire Fangs and Eyes[/url] by Alpex 8
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22565//?]Royal Bloodline - Vampire Lord perk tree - abilities - and more [/url] by xyks

[line]

= Credits =

* Ronsan123 (For the photos and scripts)
* Zim8662 (This is based on his mod)
* Bethesda (For the Game)
* SkyrimNexusMod(Only place where i can upload my mods)

P.S Sorry fo mah oolala Grammar 
[/font]
author: UnknownHuman
